docs.lead_paragraph: Your Jokes | Use the comment link below:
docs.abstract: Your Jokes | I'm surprised that no one has branded the underwear bomber: Fruit of the Boom. -- Wally Zebco
docs.snippet: Your Jokes | I'm surprised that no one has branded the underwear bomber: Fruit of the Boom. -- Wally Zebco

docs.lead_paragraph: This week on the Bucks blog, our contributors, along with some of our favorite sources, are posting about their new year's financial resolutions. Here, Jennifer Saranow Schultz, the lead blogger for Bucks, shares her own plans.
docs.abstract: Bucks' lead blogger, Jennifer Saranow Schultz, resolves to update a budget she and her husband made a few years ago.
docs.snippet: Bucks' lead blogger, Jennifer Saranow Schultz, resolves to update a budget she and her husband made a few years ago.

docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Ben Nelson, Democrat of Nebraska, has been feeling the heat from critics and former supporters.

headline.seo: Senator Ben Nelson Defends His Health Care Vote Back Home

docs.lead_paragraph: By far the most trafficked Motherlode post this year was when Emmie, a single young woman about to start a prestigious and demanding graduate school program, found herself unexpectedly pregnant.

headline.main: The Fate of Two Unplanned Pregnancies

docs.abstract: Some of this year's posters provide updates on their lives and discuss how they felt about the help, and the criticism, they received from Motherlode readers.
docs.snippet: Some of this year's posters provide updates on their lives and discuss how they felt about the help, and the criticism, they received from Motherlode readers.

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal authorities are busy sweating the details of how information about the would-be Christmas Day bomber failed to add up to effective action before the suspect tried to blow up a Detroit-bound flight.

headline.main: The Early Word: Piecing Things Together

docs.abstract: Federal authorities are sweating over how information they had about the would-be Christmas Day bomber failed to add up to action before the suspect tried to blow up a Detroit-bound flight.
docs.snippet: Federal authorities are sweating over how information they had about the would-be Christmas Day bomber failed to add up to action before the suspect tried to blow up a Detroit-bound flight.

docs.lead_paragraph: Florida’s attorney general questioned the constitutionality of the bill and called on states to study whether to sue to kill a requirement that individuals buy health insurance or pay a fine.

headline.main: Florida Republican May File Suit Over Health Bill
headline.print_headline: Republican In Florida May File Suit Over Bill

docs.snippet: Florida’s attorney general questioned the constitutionality of the bill and called on states to study whether to sue to kill a requirement that individuals buy health insurance or pay a fine.

docs.lead_paragraph: Despite legal assistance, New Yorkers learn that lenders have little incentive to renegotiate their mortgages.

docs.lead_paragraph: In Richmond, Va., where hospital beds are fewer, health care looks like the rest of the country’s, but cheaper.
